submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumOperations(self, nums: List[int], target: List[int]) -> int:
        n = len(nums) - 1
        nums_diff = [nums[0]]
        nums_diff.extend(nums[i+1] - nums[i] for i in range(n))
        target_diff = [target[0]]
        target_diff.extend(target[i+1] - target[i] for i in range(n))
        positive = negative = 0
        for i in range(n + 1):
            nums_value = nums_diff[i]
            target_value = target_diff[i]
            if nums_value > target_value:
                negative += nums_value - target_value
            else:
                positive += target_value - nums_value
        # print(nums_diff)
        # print(target_diff)
        # print(positive, negative)
        return max(positive, negative)
